short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to help with quizzes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quiz Mate is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your online quiz experience. Whether you're a student preparing for exams, a professional looking to sharpen your skills, or just someone who loves taking quizzes, Quiz Mate is here to help you succeed.


Key Features:

1. Seamless Integration:

Quiz Mate integrates effortlessly with popular quiz platforms. It automatically detects quiz pages and activates its features to assist you.

2. Real-time Assistance:

Quiz Mate provides real-time suggestions and explanations to help you understand the questions better and choose the correct answers.

3. Customizable Settings:

Tailor Quiz Mate to your preferences. Enable automatic answering functionality to create a personalized quiz-taking experience.

4. Secure and Private:

Your data privacy is our top priority. Quiz Mate operates locally on your browser and does not store or transmit any personal information. All your quiz data remains secure and private.

5. User-friendly Interface:

Enjoy a clean and intuitive interface that makes using Quiz Mate a breeze. The extension is designed to be user-friendly, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable experience for users of all ages.



How to Use:

1. Install Quiz Mate from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Finish the signin process
3. Navigate to a supported quiz platform.
4. Quiz Mate will automatically detect the quiz and activate its features.
5. Take your quiz with the assistance of real-time hints.
6. Customize settings to enable automatic answering.


Support:

If you have any questions, feedback, or need assistance, please contact our support team at quizmate@figbyte.site. We're here to help you make the most out of Quiz Mate.
